vlive.korean: 쇼파에서 잠들 때 너무 편안하지 않아? Don't you feel so comfortable when you fall asleep on the couch? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] KIM JAEJOONG X CouchTalk - 김재중 X 카우치토크

vlive.korean: [결국 화면 이탈] [저기 다람지 혹시 쇼파 뒤에 있어요??] [Out of the frame] [Are you there, cutie?] View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 저기요 여기 혹시 쓰리라차 있어요? (3RACHA playing their songs)

vlive.korean: [방판이들 전체 집합] 여기 앉아보자, 쇼파도 기가 막힌데? [BPS members, come here] let's sit on the couch. It looks so great. 듣기 View video 방판소년단-SBS Plus : [방판소년단 EP79] 재효, 입대 전 이별방송(bps도 막방!)

쇼파죠, 쇼파 준비했습니다. We got sofas ready. 듣기 View video PeekaVoo! : [REPLAY] VICTON's - 빅톤의 팬미팅라이브!

examples.korean: After divorcing actress Nicole Kidman, Cruise went on the Oprah Winfrey show and declared his love for his new actress girlfriend Katie Holmes by jumping up and down on a couch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여배우 니콜 키드먼과 이혼한 후에 크루즈는 오프라 윈프리 쇼에 출연해서 쇼파에서 앉았다 일어섰다 하면서 새 여자친구인 여배우 케이티 홈즈를 사랑한다고 선언했다. Neungyule
examples.english: After divorcing actress Nicole Kidman, Cruise went on the Oprah Winfrey show and declared his love for his new actress girlfriend Katie Holmes by jumping up and down on a couch. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: First it was Tom Cruise's infamous performance on the Oprah Winfrey Show in which he leapt upon a couch midway and proclaimed his undying love for his girlfriend Katie Holmes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 톰 크루즈의 악명 높은 행동은 우선 오프라 윈프리 쇼에 나와 쇼 중간에 쇼파 위로 펄쩍펄쩍 뛰면서 자신의 여자친구인 케이티 홈즈에게 영원한 사랑을 선언한 것이다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: First it was Tom Cruise's infamous performance on the Oprah Winfrey Show in which he leapt upon a couch midway and proclaimed his undying love for his girlfriend Katie Holmes. Add to Wordbook
